typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		PersonID as integer,
		FullName as string,
		PreferredName as string,
		IsPermittedToLogon as boolean,
		LogonName as string,
		IsExternalLogonProvider as boolean,
		HashedPassword as binary,
		IsSystemUser as boolean,
		IsEmployee as boolean,
		IsSalesperson as boolean,
		UserPreferences as string,
		PhoneNumber as string,
		FaxNumber as string,
		EmailAddress as string,
		Photo as binary,
		CustomFields as string,
		LastEditedBy as integer,
		ValidFrom as timestamp,
		ValidTo as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> PeopleStaging
source(output(
		Id as integer,
		PersonID as integer,
		FullName as string,
		PreferredName as string,
		IsPermittedToLogon as boolean,
		LogonName as string,
		IsExternalLogonProvider as boolean,
		HashedPassword as binary,
		IsSystemUser as boolean,
		IsEmployee as boolean,
		IsSalesperson as boolean,
		UserPreferences as string,
		PhoneNumber as string,
		FaxNumber as string,
		EmailAddress as string,
		Photo as binary,
		CustomFields as string,
		LastEditedBy as integer,
		ValidFrom as timestamp,
		ValidTo as timestamp,
		CurrentRow as boolean
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> PeopleDim
PeopleStaging derive(CurrentRow = 1) ~> AddingCurrentRow
AddingCurrentRow sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		Id as integer,
		PersonID as integer,
		FullName as string,
		PreferredName as string,
		IsPermittedToLogon as boolean,
		LogonName as string,
		IsExternalLogonProvider as boolean,
		HashedPassword as binary,
		IsSystemUser as boolean,
		IsEmployee as boolean,
		IsSalesperson as boolean,
		UserPreferences as string,
		PhoneNumber as string,
		FaxNumber as string,
		EmailAddress as string,
		Photo as binary,
		CustomFields as string,
		LastEditedBy as integer,
		ValidFrom as timestamp,
		ValidTo as timestamp,
		CurrentRow as boolean
	),
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError',
	mapColumn(
		PersonID,
		FullName,
		PreferredName,
		IsPermittedToLogon,
		LogonName,
		IsExternalLogonProvider,
		HashedPassword,
		IsSystemUser,
		IsEmployee,
		IsSalesperson,
		UserPreferences,
		PhoneNumber,
		FaxNumber,
		EmailAddress,
		Photo,
		CustomFields,
		LastEditedBy,
		ValidFrom,
		ValidTo,
		CurrentRow
	)) ~> sink1
